overview.summary: Geomancer is a top-tier Epic champion known for his HP burn mechanics and damage redirection. He excels in Clan Boss, Hydra, and other PvE content due to his ability to reflect damage and apply debuffs reliably.

A1.name: Stoneguard
A1.description: Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 30% chance of decreasing Turn Meter by 15%.

A2.name: Explosive Shield
A2.description: Places a [HP Burn] debuff and a [Shield] buff. Reflects damage back to attacker while shield is active.

A3.name: Quicksand Grasp
A3.description: Attacks all enemies. Transfers debuffs from allies to enemies. Applies [HP Burn] and [Weaken] debuffs.

Passive.name: Stoneguard's Vengeance
Passive.description: Reduces damage taken from enemies under [HP Burn]. Reflects a portion of damage back to attacker.

gear_priority.notes: Accuracy is critical for applying debuffs. Speed tuning is essential for Clan Boss and Hydra.

mastery_simulation.notes: Warmaster is optimal for HP Burn damage. Support tree boosts debuff uptime and gear synergy.

avoid_pairing: Champions that rely on Freeze or Stun (conflicts with HP Burn)

module_breakdown.Module 10: Clan Boss Strategy and Speed Tuning

final_summary.verdict: Geomancer is one of the most impactful Epic champions for PvE content, especially Clan Boss and Hydra. His ability to reflect damage and apply HP Burn makes him a staple in many endgame teams.
final_summary.build_notes: Prioritize Accuracy and Speed. Use Perception or Immortal sets. Warmaster is key for damage output. Avoid pairing with Freeze/Stun champions to preserve HP Burn uptime.
